CustomField.formula: If(AND((YEAR( TODAY() ) *12 + MONTH( TODAY() )) - (YEAR( Purchase_Date__c ) *12 + MONTH( Purchase_Date__c)) > 24, OR( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Discount_Camping',RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Free_Trials') ),true,false)
CustomField.label: DG_Delete_Discount_Camping_Free_Trial
